home.title: Frontend Developer
home.description: I'm Omar, a passionate frontend developer with extensive experience building accessible, animated, and performant web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks and libraries.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm <name>OmarAlQussas</name>, a passionate <role> Frontend Developer</role> with a deep curiosity for crafting intuitive, accessible, and animated user interfaces. With years of experience in <ai> React</ai> and <ml> TypeScript</ml> , I specialize in building responsive, internationalized, and SEO-friendly applications that deliver exceptional user experiences.
about.experience: I've worked on diverse projects across <visualization>UI/UX Implementation</visualization>, <analytics> performance optimization</analytics>, and <modeling>state management</modeling>, collaborating closely with designers and backend engineers in agile environments to bring products to life. My approach blends technical precision with a strong focus on accessibility and smooth interactions — ensuring every pixel serves a purpose and every animation enhances usability.
about.goal: My goal is to continue advancing in the fields of <research>frontend architecture</research> and <innovation>accessible web innovation</innovation>, contributing to products that are not only beautiful and fast but also inclusive and intuitive for all users.
about.name: Omar AlQussas

tech.title: Tech Stack & Tools
tech.description: A snapshot of the technologies I use to build modern, responsive, and accessible web applications.

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.message: Omar’s attention to detail and commitment to accessibility make his UIs stand out. He brings designs to life with flawless execution.

items.name: Ali Hassan
items.message: Working with Omar was a pleasure. His clean code, use of modern tooling like TanStack Query, and thoughtful animations elevate every project.

items.name: Maya El-Sayed
items.message: Omar perfectly bridges design and development—his implementations are pixel-perfect and always respect accessibility standards.

items.title: Internationalized E-Commerce Platform
items.description: Built a fully responsive store with multi-language support using next-intl, authentication via NextAuth, and cart state managed with TanStack Query.

items.title: Animated Portfolio Website
items.description: A personal portfolio with scroll-triggered animations, dark mode, and optimized performance using Next.js and Framer Motion.

items.title: Task Management Dashboard
items.description: A Trello-inspired app with drag-and-drop, real-time updates, and role-based views built with React, TanStack Query, and PostgreSQL.

Contact.title: Contact Me
Contact.description: Feel free to reach out via email or connect on GitHub or LinkedIn.

cta.title: Interested in collaborating or have a project idea?
cta.description: Feel free to reach out! I'm always open to discussing new opportunities and collaborations.

items.title: Internationalized E-Commerce Platform
items.description: Built a fully responsive store with multi-language support using next-intl, authentication via NextAuth, and cart state managed with TanStack Query.

items.title: Animated Portfolio Website
items.description: A personal portfolio with scroll-triggered animations, dark mode, and optimized performance using Next.js and Framer Motion.

items.title: Task Management Dashboard
items.description: A Trello-inspired app with drag-and-drop, real-time updates, and role-based views built with React, TanStack Query, and PostgreSQL.

items.title: Admin Panel with shadcn/ui
items.description: A sleek, accessible admin dashboard using shadcn components, dark mode toggle, and responsive data tables.

items.title: Chat Interface with Streaming UI
items.description: A responsive chat UI with message streaming effects, typing indicators, and smooth scroll behavior.

items.title: Accessibility-First Landing Page
items.description: A WCAG-compliant landing page with keyboard navigation, ARIA labels, and reduced motion support.

items.title: Expense Tracker with Charts
items.description: A mobile-first expense app with interactive charts, local storage, and form validation.

items.title: Multi-step Form Wizard
items.description: A reusable, accessible form wizard with validation, progress tracking, and responsive layout.

items.title: Weather Dashboard
items.description: A weather app with geolocation, caching via TanStack Query, and responsive card layout.
